description: Summarize given text or any text document

variables.value: Workshop - Modernizing Enterprise Apps with Java: This workshop is designed to provide an understanding of modernizing Java applications with Data for cloud native services on Azure. Participants will gain hands-on learning experience of Java applications on Azure services, as well as experience on monitoring options for these solutions and operations.

output.prompt:
[INSTRUCTIONS]
Summarize the following conversation in 2-3 sentences. After summarizing, create a [LAST 3 MESSAGES] section that copy and pastes last 3 messages.

[CONVERSATION HISTORY]
Workshop - Modernizing Enterprise Apps with Java: This workshop is designed to provide an understanding of modernizing Java applications with Data for cloud native services on Azure. Participants will gain hands-on learning experience of Java applications on Azure services, as well as experience on monitoring options for these solutions and operations.

[SUMMARY]
output.result:
This workshop provides an understanding of modernizing Java applications with Data for cloud native services on Azure. Participants will gain hands-on learning experience of Java applications on Azure services, as well as experience on monitoring options for these solutions and operations.

[LAST 3 MESSAGES]
Participants will gain hands-on learning experience of Java applications on Azure services, as well as experience on monitoring options for these solutions and operations.
